title: What bands or artists would you recommend for Marilyn Manson fans? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey ya, thanks for this question. Marilyn Manson is in the industrial rock genre so I would give Nine Inch Nails, Ministry and Rammstein a try. However, if you like Marilyn Manson for his lyrics then I would recommend Slipknot, Korn (as someone has mentioned here), System of a Down, Rage Against the Machine, Linkin Park, Soundgarden, Tool and A Perfect Circle. They are in different music genres but their lyrics are amazing and of course the music arrangement, especially Tool, is ingenious. Enjoy exploring 😊🤟🖤

While not terribly familiar with Marliyn Manson, I would suggest trying Siouxsie and the Banshees , The Cure, Rob Zombie, Apple of Sodom, Korn, Rammstein, or Slipknot. But none will be exact, but hopefully are in the same neighbourhood as Manson. Good Luck and enjoy.
